title: Development of On-Demand Hint Utilization Strategies in Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics comprehension and basic digital device manipulation
context.additional_context: Problem-solving activities conducted using digital devices in the classroom. Implementation of an on-demand hint system tailored to individual learning levels.

learning_goals: Students can select and utilize on-demand hints at appropriate stages during the mathematical problem-solving process
Students can improve error correction and concept application skills by over 80% after utilizing hints
Students can develop self-directed learning strategies based on their hint usage patterns
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
